agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: International Relations & Economic Development TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, February 19, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Rafael Anchia The committee will meet for an organizational hearing with invited testimony only. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
